Instance.description: A special Custom States Situation that forces a specific Sim to be in the situation no matter what they are currently doing. Only exclusivity will keep them in one of their current situations and not move them over to this one.

Tunable.name: specific_sim_expectation_preference
Tunable.description: If the expectation preference is set for the invite to this situation. This is a function of exclusivity. Please talk to your GPE partner of if this should be checked or not.

Tunable.name: specific_sim_job
Tunable.description: The job specific Sim that has to be put into this situation no matter their current situation.
